mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO at_store_tran_line ( FID, FEntryID, FDBType, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FQty, FOutStockID, FOutStockNumber, FOutStockName, FInStockID, FInStockNumber, FInStockName, FBatch, FRate, FInPrice, FInAmount, FNote ) VALUES
( #{entry.FID}, #{entry.FEntryID}, #{entry.FDBType}, #{entry.FMaterialID}, #{entry.FMaterialNumber}, #{entry.FMaterialName}, #{entry.FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{entry.FMaterialTypeName}, #{entry.FUnit}, #{entry.FQty}, #{entry.FOutStockID}, #{entry.FOutStockNumber}, #{entry.FOutStockName}, #{entry.FInStockID}, #{entry.FInStockNumber}, #{entry.FInStockName}, #{entry.FBatch}, #{entry.FRate}, #{entry.FInPrice}, #{entry.FInAmount}, #{entry.FNote} )
